title: We Came to See You, Hiroshima! Part 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Hiroshima has so many delicious foods, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu loves these steamed buns! They’re so cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>There are so many different types of sweet buns!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s so hard to decide what to get as souvenirs for everyone~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah... I can’t decide. They all look delicious...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>What if we buy them all?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It might be too much to carry if we buy too many......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>This is so tough!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What should we do...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>How about we ask everyone at the venue?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>...That’s our only option!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s right! Let’s ask everyone what souvenirs they recommend!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s an Emma-gency!! They have to recommend Hiroshima souvenirs to us~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
